Class Question

java.lang.Object
com.bitbybit.model.Question
public class Question extends Object
Represents a single Jeopardy question, including its category, value, question text, multiple-choice options, correct answer, and whether it has been answered.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question(String id, String category, int value, String question, String optionA, String optionB, String optionC, String optionD, String correctAnswer)
      Constructs a new Question instance.
      Parameters:
      id - A unique identifier for the question.
      category - The category to which this question belongs.
      value - The point value of the question.
      question - The text of the question.
      optionA - The text for option A.
      optionB - The text for option B.
      optionC - The text for option C.
      optionD - The text for option D.
      correctAnswer - The correct answer (e.g., "A", "B", "C", "D").

    • isAnswered

      public boolean isAnswered()
      Checks if the question has been answered.
      Returns:
      true if the question has been answered, false otherwise.

    • markAnswered

      public void markAnswered(boolean answered)
      Marks the question as answered or unanswered.
      Parameters:
      answered - true to mark as answered, false to mark as unanswered.
